trends: There have been no other sightings in Jourdanton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsat 6:44 pm 12\9\2012 i observed 5 lights moving across the northwest sky heading south. they disappeared behind a large thunderhead and re-emerged to the south of the cloud. i snapped a photograph. several slowed as if to allow the others to catch up. before i could zoom on them, they were gone. headed to the south, southwest.
Summary: Observed fast moving lights in western sky, went behind storm cloud then re-emerged and continued north to south path.
